title: Find Ratios of Consecutive Terms
text: To determine if a sequence is geometric, we find the ratio of the consecutive terms shown.
speech: To determine if a sequence is geometric, we find the ratio of the consecutive terms shown.
pacedSpeech: To determine if a sequence is geometric, we find the ratio of the consecutive terms shown.

title: Ratio Between $$4$$ and $$8$$
text: What is the common ratio between $$4$$ and 8? Effectively, what is $$\frac{8}{4}$$?
speech: What is the common ratio between , 4  and 8? Effectively, what is  8 fourths, ?

title: Ratio Between $$16$$ and $$32$$
text: What is the common ratio between $$16$$ and 32? Effectively, what is $$\frac{32}{16}$$?
speech: What is the common ratio between , 16  and 32? Effectively, what is  32 over 16 ?

title: Ratio Between $$32$$ and $$64$$
text: What is the common ratio between $$32$$ and 64? Effectively, what is $$\frac{64}{32}$$?
speech: What is the common ratio between , 32  and 64? Effectively, what is  64 over 32 ?

title: Ratio Between $$64$$ and $$128$$
text: What is the common ratio between $$64$$ and 128? Effectively, what is $$\frac{128}{64}$$?
speech: What is the common ratio between , 64  and 128? Effectively, what is  128 over 64 ?

hintAnswer: Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=2$$.
title: Determining Commonality in Ratios
text: Are the ratios between consecutive terms common?
choices: Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=2$$.
Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=4$$.
Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=\frac{1}{3}$$.
No, the series is not geometric.
speech: Are the ratios between consecutive terms common?
pacedSpeech: Are the ratios between consecutive terms common?
